solution_line_template: First find the total number of goldfish Millie adds: {pretzels} pretzels * {goldfish_per_pretzel} goldfish/pretzel = <<{pretzels}*{goldfish_per_pretzel}={goldfish}>>{goldfish} goldfish
Then add the number of each kind of snack to find the total: {goldfish} goldfish + {pretzels} pretzels + {suckers} suckers = <<{goldfish}+{pretzels}+{suckers}={total_snacks}>>{total_snacks} snacks

Then divide the total number of snacks by the number of baggies to find the number of snacks per baggie: {total_snacks} snacks / {baggies} baggies = <<{total_snacks}/{baggies}={snacks_per_baggie}>>{snacks_per_baggie} snacks/baggie
